title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
ide you'll see the Book of Dead Gods (X:-321 Y:-270).

Interact with the book and you'll have a few options to choose from:

[ARCANA] Search for an arcane rune to sabotage. [STRENGTH] Smash the lock open. [WARLOCK] [CHARISMA] Channel your patron's strength into the lock. Leave.

Choosing any of the three options will require you to pass a skill check with DC 10, successfully doing so will release the lock and open the book. Your next set of choices will look like this:

[RELIGION] Examine the bo
